Frequently Asked Questions

What is the Smart DCU Data Dashboard?

The Smart DCU Data Dashboard is a platform that provides real-time data and insights to monitor various aspects of campus life, including air quality, noise levels, room occupancy, parking availability, and more.

How can I access the dashboard?

Access to the Smart DCU Data Dashboard is provided to authorized users. If you are a student, faculty, or staff member of the university, you can log in using your credentials. New users can register for an account to gain access.

What kind of data sources are available on the dashboard?

The dashboard offers a variety of data sources including air quality monitoring, noise level monitoring, room occupancy tracking, campus occupancy monitoring, and parking availability monitoring.

How often is the data updated on the dashboard?

The data on the dashboard is updated in real-time or at regular intervals, depending on the specific data source. You can find more details about the update frequency in the respective data source descriptions.

Can I customize the dashboard according to my preferences?

Yes, you can customize the dashboard by selecting and arranging the widgets and data visualizations according to your preferences. Some customization options may be available depending on your user role and permissions.

Is the dashboard accessible on mobile devices?

Yes, the Smart DCU Data Dashboard is designed to be responsive and accessible across different devices and screen sizes, including mobile phones and tablets.

Can I export data from the dashboard for analysis?

No , This data is not available for export due to security concerns

How secure is the data on the dashboard?

The security of data on the dashboard is a top priority. We employ advanced encryption and authentication measures to ensure the confidentiality, integrity, and availability of the data.

How can I contact for support or assistance with the dashboard?

For support or assistance with the Smart DCU Data Dashboard, you can contact our dedicated support team at teamc@gmail.com. We're here to help you with any questions or issues you may encounter.

Are there any tutorials or documentation available for using the dashboard?

Yes, we provide tutorials and documentation to help you get started with using the Smart DCU Data Dashboard effectively.
